mapper.select: SELECT a.seq , a.name , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime , a.delNy , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commoncode aa WHERE aa.commonGroup_seq = a.seq AND aa.delNy = 0 ) xcodeCount FROM commongroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq} ORDER BY a.seq DESC

SELECT a.seq , a.name , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime , a.delNy , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commongroup bb ) xcodeGroupCount , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commoncode aa WHERE aa.commonGroup_seq = a.seq AND aa.delNy = 0 ) xcodeCount FROM commongroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.name = #{name} ORDER BY a.seq DESC

SELECT a.seq , a.name , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime , a.delNy , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commongroup bb ) xcodeGroupCount , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commoncode aa WHERE aa.commonGroup_seq = a.seq AND aa.delNy = 0 ) xcodeCount FROM commongroup a WHERE 1=1 AND (a.regDateTime BETWEEN IF(#{xdateType} = 'regDt', date(#{xdateFrom}), date('1000-01-01')) AND IF(#{xdateType} = 'regDt', date(#{xdateTo})+1, date('1000-01-01')) OR a.modDateTime BETWEEN IF(#{xdateType} = 'modDt', date(#{xdateFrom}), date('1000-01-01')) AND IF(#{xdateType} = 'modDt', date(#{xdateTo})+1, date('1000-01-01')) ) AND a.delNy != #{delNy} ORDER BY a.seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commongroup ( name , regDateTime , modDateTime , delNy ) VALUES ( #{name} , now() , now() , 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE commongroup SET delNy = 1 , modDateTime = now() WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
UPDATE commongroup SET delNy = 0 , modDateTime = now() WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
